QuestData.Title: A Bloody Delight
QuestData.Description: A warrior is not ready for battle until he tastes the blood of his enemies.$B$BI am still too weak to hunt, so you must go in my stead.$B$BOnly the blood from the fiercest predators will do. I can smell their presence in the waters outside this cave!$B$BBring this to me, and then perhaps you shall see why they call me the Bloodseeker.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 100 Volatile Blood from Dread Remoras.
QuestData.CompletionText: By drinking the blood of your enemies, you acquire their strength.
